org.mortbay.util
Interface LifeCycle

All Known Subinterfaces:
HttpHandler, HttpListener, LogSink, RequestLog, SessionManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
Holder, HttpContext, HttpServer, ThreadPool, LifeCycleThread
public interface LifeCycle

A component LifeCycle. Represents the life cycle interface for an abstract software component.

Version:
$Id: LifeCycle.java,v 1.3 2001/11/09 12:14:52 gregwilkins Exp $
Author:
Greg Wilkins (gregw)

Method Summary
 boolean isStarted()
           
 void start()
          Start the LifeCycle.
 void stop()
          Stop the LifeCycle.
 

Method Detail

start

public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
Start the LifeCycle.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - An arbitrary exception may be thrown.

stop

public void stop()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Stop the LifeCycle. The LifeCycle may wait for current activities to complete normally, but it can be interrupted.

isStarted

public boolean isStarted()
Returns:
True if the LifeCycle has been started.
